suggestedAction.description: suggestedAction for product instance / mandate request / payment / customer vpa verification failure / closure

adjCode.description: Code sent by npci after adjustments

adjFlag.description: Flag sent by npci after adjustments

errCode.description: Error code returned by Setu for refund failures

npciErrCode.description: Error code received from NPCI in case refund request fails

npciErrDesc.example: ONLINE REFUND IS DISABLED IN UPI

example.npciErrDesc: ONLINE REFUND IS DISABLED IN UPI

amount.description: Amount (in paise) that needs to be collected from the user. If populated this value gets displayed on the payer PSP's payment page

closedAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the closure date & time

createdAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

expiryDate.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the expiry date & time

id.description: Id of the resource, which is the same the id returned in the Create <resource> API response

intentLink.description: A UPI pay intent link built according to the spec enforced by NPCI

merchantId.description: Id associated with the merchant on our platform

merchantName.description: Name of the merchant on our platform

merchantVpa.description: UPI id of the merchant on which the payments are collected

metadata.description: field provided for the merchant to add additional key-value pairs

minAmount.description: Minimum amount (in paise) - on setting this value the amount field on the PSP's payment page becomes editable and the customer can pay an amount equal to or greater than the minimum amount

qrCode.description: QR code for the generated intent link in the form of base64 encoded string

referenceId.description: reference id in the merchant's system

shortLink.description: A shortened URL for the given intent link

status.description: status defining the validity of the product instance

transactionNote.description: Transaction note displayed to the customer at the payer PSP's payment page

expireAfter.description: Number of minutes after which the mandate revoke request will expire

id.description: Id of the mandate request resource

merchantId.description: Id of the merchant who created the mandate

referenceId.description: Merchant reference id of the mandate

expireAfter.description: Number of minutes after which the mandate revoke request will expire

referenceId.description: Merchant reference id of the mandate

accountHolderName.description: account holder name for the settlement bank account

accountNumber.description: account number for the settlement bank account

accountType.description: account type for the settlement bank account

active.description: defines the validity of the settlement bank account

beneCode.description: bene code associated with the settlement bank account

createdAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

id.description: Id of the resource, which is the same the id returned in the Create <resource> API response

ifsc.description: ifsc for the settlement bank account

merchantId.description: Id associated with the merchant on our platform

primary.description: indicates if given settlement bank account is primary settlement bank account for merchant

status.description: status defining the validity of the payment link

accountName.description: account holder name for the account

amountLimit.description: Maximum amount for which a mandate transaction can be executed

expireAfter.description: Number of minutes after which the mandate update request will expire

id.description: Id of the mandate request resource

merchantId.description: Id of the merchant who created the mandate

qrCode.description: QR code for the generated intent link in the form of base64 encoded string

referenceId.description: Merchant reference id of the mandate

active.description: defines the validity of the settlement bank account

status.description: updated status of the VPA

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the verification request

customerVpa.description: UPI id of the customer that needs to be verified

id.description: ID of the request

merchantId.description: Id associated with the merchant on our platform

referenceId.description: Id to be used by merchant to identify the verifcation request on our platform

status.description: status defining the validity of the customer vpa

customerVpa.description: UPI id of the customer that needs to be verified

referenceId.description: Id to be used by merchant to identify the verifcation request on our platform

brandName.description: Brand name or Consumer facing name

legalName.description: Legal name as per incorporation documents

createdAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

id.description: Id of the resource, which is the same the id returned in the Create <resource> API response

merchantId.description: Id associated with the merchant on our platform

referenceId.description: reference id in the merchant's system

status.description: indicates the validity of vpa

verificationStatus.description: indicates if the vpa is verified or not. Could be one of (verified, pending, failed)

vpa.description: UPI id of the merchant to be used to collect payments

jwt_header_Authorization.description: Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token.
